ctu_text: The objective of this scheme is to offer aspiring postgraduate students an opportunity for internship facilities to be trained as qualified interns in state-run private children's and shelter homes who can be offered hands-on job training experience. The scheme is open to any student who has passed out from any of the recognised universities with a Master's Degree in Social Service/ Social Work/ Sociology/ Psychology/ Home Science/ Post Graduate Diploma in Counselling etc. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Number", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The total number of slots for interns per year shall be fixed at 15, extendable upto 20.
